parameters.name: DName
parameters.description: If OverrideType is... Then set DName to... 1 Name of the pattern instance dimension to override 2 "Spacing Increment"

parameters.name: PatternType
parameters.description: Type of pattern (see Remarks ): 2 = linear 4 = circular 256 = variable

parameters.name: OverrideType
parameters.description: Type of increment override: 1 = dimension 2 = spacing

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Direction in which to apply the spacing override. If OverrideType is ... Then set Direction to ... 2 0 = direction 1 1 = direction 2 1 -1

parameters.name: InstanceRowIndex
parameters.description: 0 < row index of the instance to modify < number of instances per row

parameters.name: InstanceColumnIndex
parameters.description: 0 < column index of the instance to modify < number of instances per column; valid only for PatternType = 2

parameters.name: OverrideValue
parameters.description: Value to override the current value of the dimension or spacing of the specified instance

parameters.name: DName
parameters.description: If OverrideType is... Then set DName to... 1 Name of the pattern instance dimension to override 2 "Spacing Increment"

parameters.name: PatternType
parameters.description: Type of pattern (see Remarks ): 2 = linear 4 = circular 256 = variable

parameters.name: OverrideType
parameters.description: Type of increment override: 1 = dimension 2 = spacing

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Direction in which to apply the spacing override. If OverrideType is ... Then set Direction to ... 2 0 = direction 1 1 = direction 2 1 -1

parameters.name: InstanceRowIndex
parameters.description: 0 < row index of the instance to modify < number of instances per row

parameters.name: InstanceColumnIndex
parameters.description: 0 < column index of the instance to modify < number of instances per column; valid only for PatternType = 2

parameters.name: OverrideValue
parameters.description: Value to override the current value of the dimension or spacing of the specified instance

returns: True if the override is applied successfully, false if not
remarks:
To vary the dimensions or spacings of pattern instances:
Call this method multiple times to override multiple dimensions or spacings of pattern instances.
Call
IFeatureManager::InsertVaryInstanceIncrement
multiple times to increment multiple dimensions or spacings of pattern instances.
If PatternType is...
Call IFeatureManager::CreateFeature(...)
2
LinearPatternFeatureData object
4
CircularPatternFeatureData object
